name: Galactic Blasters ++ - Kuipic Sniper
description:
Galactic Blasters ++ - Kuipic Snipers is the third Galactic Blasters game (and the first one for Windows).

It is an endless horizontal space shooter game that takes place in the year 2046, when a member of the Heroic Defenders of Earth (H.D.E. for short) is sent on a mission to the Kuiper Belt, where a large fleet of enemy spaceships are located.

[Rating - RGAR 1] [Game - v1.00]
